title: Hear more about AI “thinking models” in our latest podcast.
description: In the latest episode of the Google AI: Release Notes podcast, host Logan Kilpatrick talks with Jack Rae, Principal Scientist at Google DeepMind. They dive deep on topic…
excerpt: In the latest episode of the Google AI: Release Notes podcast, host Logan Kilpatrick talks with Jack Rae, Principal Scientist at Google DeepMind. They dive deep on topics like the practical applications of thinking models, the impact of increased “thinking time” on model performance and the key role of long context.You can watch the video below for the full conversation, or listen to the podcast on Apple Podcasts or Spotify.
text: In the latest episode of the Google AI: Release Notes podcast, host Logan Kilpatrick talks with Jack Rae, Principal Scientist at Google DeepMind. They dive deep on topics like the practical applications of thinking models, the impact of increased “thinking time” on model performance and the key role of long context.You can watch the video below for the full conversation, or listen to the podcast on Apple Podcasts or Spotify.
html:
In the latest episode of the Google AI: Release Notes podcast, host Logan Kilpatrick talks with Jack Rae, Principal Scientist at Google DeepMind. They dive deep on topics like the practical applications of thinking models, the impact of increased “thinking time” on model performance and the key role of long context.

You can watch the video below for the full conversation, or listen to the podcast on Apple Podcasts or Spotify.
